dialogues.line1: You can move by right clicking where you want to go.
dialogues.line2: To take a better look around with Q and E.

dialogues.line1: I hope it is not too late. I need to find Nerala as soon as possible,
dialogues.line2: I don't want to waste any time on this excuse of a camp.

dialogues.line1: An enemy! You can attack by right clicking on them
dialogues.line2: be careful though, if they detect you, they will strike back!

dialogues.line1: To better avoid being detected, you can enter stealth
dialogues.line2: by pressing shift.

dialogues.line1: To deal with this encounter you will have to use your knife,
dialogues.line2: Press 1 then left click on the enemy to use it.

dialogues.line1: You have three skills that can be use with the numbers 1, 2 and 3.
dialogues.line2: Your ultimate (ability 3) consumes spice to cast. So think before using it

dialogues.line1: You have access to a new character.
dialogues.line2: Press Z to select Zhib and X to select Nerala.

dialogues.line1: Her Abilities focus on infiltration (Ability 1, Sleeping Dart) and
dialogues.line2: stealth (ability 2, Smoke Bomb), her ultimate allows a long distance kill

dialogues.line1: Sleeping Dart Snoozes its target, making it easy to get around them.
dialogues.line2: Smoke bomb creates an area that makes it much more difficult to be detected.

dialogues.line1: Enemies drop spice when defeated. Pick it up by right clicking on it
dialogues.line2: Spice will be directly added to your inventory

dialogues.line1: I see we require a different type of movement here,
dialogues.line2: go ahead and do your thing.

dialogues.line1: (Nods in agreement).
These types of walls can be climbed by Nerala
dialogues.line2: simply click on the wall and she will climb to the top.

dialogues.line1: Probably Shouldn't engage these enemies head on without some backup.
There are sounds of a struggle going on coming from there, I think
dialogues.line2: Nerala finally got angry with her captors, better go find her quickly.

dialogues.line1: *Nerala Appears from behind Zhib, aiming at him with her crossbow*
dialogues.line2: To be on this side of the fight is as scary as always.

dialogues.line1: What happened here? We have to liberate these men,
dialogues.line2: we cannot leave them here.

dialogues.line1: There are sounds of a struggle going on coming from there, I think
dialogues.line2: Nerala finally got angry with her captors, better go find her quickly.

dialogues.line2: Nerala finally got angry with her captors, better go find her quickly.
